import React from "react" import { ListGroup } from "reactstrap" import CartItem from "./CartItem" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "../../styles/shopping-cart.css" import { useDispatch,useSelector } from "react-redux" import { cartUiActions } from "../../store/shopping-cart/cartUiSlice" const Cart = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cartProducts = useSelector(state=>state.cart.cartItems) const toggleCart =()=>{ dispatch(cartUiActions.toggle()) } return (
{cartProducts.length === 0 ?
No item added to the cart
: cartProducts.map((item,index)=>( ))}
Subtotal amount: $123
) } export default Cart
